Gwyneth Paltrow compiled a  to help prepare her kids for her divorce PERIOD

The 51yearold star  who has daughter Apple  and son Moses  with ex husband Chris Martin  wanted to research other people whose parents had got divorced to help decide how she would approach her own split from the Coldplay singer in  PERIOD

She told Bustle magazine But Chris Martin and I both really did not want to have them experience the divorce as a trauma.. PERIOD

At that time I did a very me thing which was when I knew I wanted to get a divorce I did this data collection of talking to adults who had been products of a broken home.wouldnt speak to each otherEvery single one of them said I didnt care that my parents got divorced PERIOD That wasnt it PERIOD

You could see they held it with so much hurt and anger PERIOD I was like Thats what Im never going to do. and we really didnt.trust your instinctsDefinitely my best parenting advice and I say this all the time is mother knows best PERIOD



Originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
